channel.title: [474]Server but with 508 maps or what ever it is
channel.description:
Looking for a 474 server but with a 508 map. I don't mind the item base seeing as if like Torva or Chaotics are on there then I can just find a way of putting them into the game.
I don't mind if it's PI/Delta/Allstar or anything like that. I just need a stable base and client that I can work with just with a 474 game frame. I will go up to 508 game frame (only because of the Orbs). Also I don't want none of the item models to be higher then 508/525. It makes the game less laggy and makes the models more HD (If you think about it)
I don't care about the skills because I won't be editing them, but I would like to have all skills working if not like 2/3 of the skills. (Not Construction or Hunter or Summoning)
Anything will do for me, just a simple base that I can work with.
Any links i'll have a look
